身.definition: body; life; oneself; personally; one's morality and conduct; the main part of a structure or body; pregnant; classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset; Kangxi radical 158

身上.definition: on the body; at hand; among

身不由己.definition: (idiom) (of one's circumstances) beyond one's control; unable to do anything about it; (of one's actions) not subject to conscious control (i.e. done in spite of oneself)

身世.definition: one's life experience; one's lot; one's past history

身份.definition: identity; aspect of one's identity (e.g. mayor, father, permanent resident); role; capacity (as in "in his capacity as ..." 以[yi3] + ... + 的身份[de5 shen1fen4]); status (social, legal etc); position; rank

身價.definition: social status; price of a slave; price of a person (a sportsman etc); worth; value (of stocks, valuables etc)

身先士卒.definition: to fight at the head of one's troops; (fig.) to take the lead

身先朝露.definition: body will go with the morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence

身分證.definition: identity card; also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]

身分證號碼.definition: variant of 身份證號碼|身份证号码[shen1 fen4 zheng4 hao4 ma3]; I.D. number

身在曹營心在漢.pinyin: shēn zài cáo yíng xīn zài hàn
身在曹營心在漢.definition: live in Cao camp but have the heart in Han camp (idiom); to be somewhere while longing to be somewhere else

身在福中不知福.pinyin: shēn zài fú zhōng bù zhī fú
身在福中不知福.definition: to live in plenty without appreciating it (idiom); not to know when one is well off

身家.definition: oneself and one's family; family background; pedigree; one's property; one's total assets

身家調查.definition: to do a background check on sb

身後.definition: the time after one's death; a place behind sb; (fig.) one's social background

身心.definition: body and mind; mental and physical

身心交病.definition: worn out in body and soul (idiom)

身心交瘁.definition: worn out in body and soul (idiom)

身敗名裂.definition: to lose one's standing; to have one's reputation swept away; a complete defeat and fall from grace

身教勝於言教.pinyin: shēn jiào shèng yú yán jiào
身教勝於言教.definition: teaching by example beats explaining in words (idiom); action speaks louder than words

身板兒.definition: erhua variant of 身板[shen1 ban3]

身正不怕影子斜.pinyin: shēn zhèng bù pà yǐng zi xié
身正不怕影子斜.definition: lit. when a man stands straight, he doesn't worry that his shadow is slanting (idiom); fig. as long as one conducts oneself honorably, one need not worry about what people think; a clean hand wants no washing

身段.definition: a woman's physique; figure; posture on stage

身法.definition: pose or motion of one's body in martial arts

身無長物.definition: to possess nothing except bare necessities; to live a poor or frugal life

身經百戰.definition: lit. veteran of a hundred battles (idiom); fig. experienced; seasoned

身臨其境.definition: (idiom) to experience it for oneself; to actually *be* there (as opposed to reading about it etc)

身處.definition: in (some place); to be in (adversity, a difficult situation, danger, turmoil etc); to find oneself in; placed in; surrounded by

身輕如燕.definition: as lithe as a swallow (of athlete or beautiful girl)

身量.definition: height (of a person); stature; (fig.) reputation; standing

身長.definition: height (of person); length of clothing from shoulders to bottom (tailor or dressmaker's measure)

身陷.definition: to be trapped; to be imprisoned

身陷牢獄.definition: to go to prison; to be imprisoned

身體是革命的本錢.pinyin: shēn tǐ shì gé mìng de běn qián
身體是革命的本錢.definition: lit. the body is the revolution's capital; fig. good health is a prerequisite for work (Mao Zedong's saying)

身體檢查.definition: see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]

身體質量指數.pinyin: shēn tǐ zhì liàng zhǐ shù
